name: asinh
description: Computes the inverse hyperpolic sine (arcsinh, arsinh, or argsinh) of your data.

properties.name: method
properties.description: Method: 'fixed' uses global scale, 'manual' reads per-channel scales from row factor, 'auto' automatically estimates optimal cofactors per channel

properties.name: scale
properties.description: The scaling factor to use before the transformation (only used when method is 'fixed')
